spec_data.Name: perl-POSIX-strftime-Compiler
spec_data.Description:
POSIX::strftime::Compiler provides GNU C library compatible strftime(3).
But this module will not affected by the system locale. This feature is
useful when you want to write loggers, servers and portable applications.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:53:39 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: GNU C library compatible strftime for loggers and servers
